hotelinTaif: Welcome to Awalive International Hotel in Taif, where comfort seamlessly blends with tranquility. Surrounded by the stunning natural beauty of mountains and the dynamic city skyline, our hotel is your perfect retreat offering mesmerizing views from the sky to the city to the mountain peaks.
restaurantWithAView: Enjoy a casual yet elegant dining experience at our Sky View Restaurant. Each meal is complemented by sweeping panoramic views, adding a touch of glamour to your dining experience under the stars.
poolAndGym: Revitalize both mind and body in our modern gym, then cool off in our peaceful swimming pool. For the ultimate relaxation, step into our soothing sauna and let the stress of the day melt away.
peacefulHotelStay: Awalive International Hotel is more than just a place to sleepâ€”it's a haven for relaxation. Our hotel offers various areas for you to enjoy some quiet time or engage in relaxing activities at your leisure.

discoverSubtitle: Immerse yourself in unparalleled comfort and elegance at Awalive International Hotel. Our hotel boasts a range of state-of-the-art facilities designed to cater to your every need. From exquisite 24/7 room service to renowned on-site dining options, including complimentary breakfast and world-class laundry services, we ensure a stay that is both luxurious and convenient. Experience the pinnacle of hospitality at Awalive, nestled in the heart of Taif.
